name: ft-chart-frame
description: Draw the title, subtitle etc. for a D3 graphic without much boiler plate code

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -n gChartframe -o build/g-chartframe.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/g-chartframe.js -c -m -o build/g-chartframe.min.js && rm -f build/g-chartframe.zip && zip -j build/g-chartframe.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/g-chartframe.js build/g-chartframe.min.js

author: tom.g.pearson@gmail.com
